mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TO_EVA_REPORT_PROCESS (PKID, CASE_CODE, EVA_CODE, REPORT_TYPE, STATUS, PROPOSEER, TRANSACTOR, ORNGIN_PRICE, FIN_ORG_ID, EVA_COM_CONTACT, CONTACT_WAY, HOUSE_AGE_APPLY, INQUIRY_RESULT, REPORT_NUM, APPLY_DATE, FORWARD_DATE, TO_ISSUE_DATE, ISSUE_DATE, EVA_PRICE, REPORT_GET_DATE, HOUSE_AGE_ISSUE, REPORT_NUM_ISSUE, REPORT_REV_DATE, RECEIVER, RECEIVE_NUM,CHANGE_INFO) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{proposeer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ornginPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{finOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaComContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseAgeApply,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inquiryResult,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reportNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{forwardDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{toIssueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{issueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{evaPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reportGetDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{houseAgeIssue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reportNumIssue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reportRevDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{changeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update sctrans.T_TO_EVA_REPORT_PROCESS

EVA_CODE = #{evaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_TYPE = #{reportType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},

REPORT_NUM = #{reportNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

FORWARD_DATE = #{forwardDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TO_ISSUE_DATE = #{toIssueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ISSUE_DATE = #{issueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update sctrans.T_TO_EVA_REPORT_PROCESS set CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVA_CODE = #{evaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORT_TYPE = #{reportType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, PROPOSEER = #{proposeer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSACTOR = #{transactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORNGIN_PRICE = #{ornginPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIN_ORG_ID = #{finOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVA_COM_CONTACT = #{evaComContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_WAY = #{contactWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSE_AGE_APPLY = #{houseAgeApply,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INQUIRY_RESULT = #{inquiryResult,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPORT_NUM = #{reportNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, APPLY_DATE = #{applyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FORWARD_DATE = #{forwardDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TO_ISSUE_DATE = #{toIssueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISSUE_DATE = #{issueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EVA_PRICE = #{evaPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPORT_GET_DATE = #{reportGetDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, HOUSE_AGE_ISSUE = #{houseAgeIssue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REPORT_NUM_ISSUE = #{reportNumIssue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REPORT_REV_DATE = #{reportRevDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RECEIVER = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECEIVE_NUM = #{receiveNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHANGE_INFO = #{changeInfo,jdbcType=INTEGER} where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT ep.PKID, CASE_CODE, EVA_CODE, REPORT_TYPE, STATUS, PROPOSEER, TRANSACTOR, ORNGIN_PRICE, FIN_ORG_ID, EVA_COM_CONTACT, CONTACT_WAY, HOUSE_AGE_APPLY, INQUIRY_RESULT, REPORT_NUM, APPLY_DATE, FORWARD_DATE, TO_ISSUE_DATE, ISSUE_DATE, EVA_PRICE, REPORT_GET_DATE, HOUSE_AGE_ISSUE, REPORT_NUM_ISSUE, REPORT_REV_DATE, RECEIVER, RECEIVE_NUM,CHANGE_INFO ,fo.FIN_ORG_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TO_EVA_REPORT_PROCESS ep
LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG fo ON ep.FIN_ORG_ID = fo.FIN_ORG_CODE WHERE CASE_CODE=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATUS != '7'

SELECT ep.PKID, CASE_CODE, EVA_CODE, REPORT_TYPE, STATUS, PROPOSEER, TRANSACTOR, ORNGIN_PRICE, FIN_ORG_ID, EVA_COM_CONTACT, CONTACT_WAY, HOUSE_AGE_APPLY, INQUIRY_RESULT, REPORT_NUM, APPLY_DATE, FORWARD_DATE, TO_ISSUE_DATE, ISSUE_DATE, EVA_PRICE, REPORT_GET_DATE, HOUSE_AGE_ISSUE, REPORT_NUM_ISSUE, REPORT_REV_DATE, RECEIVER, RECEIVE_NUM,CHANGE_INFO ,fo.FIN_ORG_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TO_EVA_REPORT_PROCESS ep LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG fo ON ep.FIN_ORG_ID = fo.FIN_ORG_CODE WHERE EVA_CODE=#{evaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT ep.PKID, CASE_CODE, EVA_CODE, REPORT_TYPE, STATUS, PROPOSEER, TRANSACTOR, ORNGIN_PRICE, FIN_ORG_ID, EVA_COM_CONTACT, CONTACT_WAY, HOUSE_AGE_APPLY, INQUIRY_RESULT, REPORT_NUM, APPLY_DATE, FORWARD_DATE, TO_ISSUE_DATE, ISSUE_DATE, EVA_PRICE, REPORT_GET_DATE, HOUSE_AGE_ISSUE, REPORT_NUM_ISSUE, REPORT_REV_DATE, RECEIVER, RECEIVE_NUM ,fo.FIN_ORG_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TO_EVA_REPORT_PROCESS ep LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG fo ON ep.FIN_ORG_ID = fo.FIN_ORG_CODE WHERE CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 from sctrans.T_TO_EVA_REPORT_PROCESS WHERE CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATUS='7' )
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TO_EVA_REPORT_PROCESS
CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVA_CODE = #{evaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPORT_TYPE = #{reportType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
PROPOSEER = #{proposeer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSACTOR = #{transactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORNGIN_PRICE = #{ornginPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FIN_ORG_ID = #{finOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVA_COM_CONTACT = #{evaComContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_WAY = #{contactWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOUSE_AGE_APPLY = #{houseAgeApply,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INQUIRY_RESULT = #{inquiryResult,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPORT_NUM = #{reportNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
APPLY_DATE = #{applyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FORWARD_DATE = #{forwardDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TO_ISSUE_DATE = #{toIssueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ISSUE_DATE = #{issueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EVA_PRICE = #{evaPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPORT_GET_DATE = #{reportGetDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
HOUSE_AGE_ISSUE = #{houseAgeIssue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REPORT_NUM_ISSUE = #{reportNumIssue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REPORT_REV_DATE = #{reportRevDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RECEIVER = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECEIVE_NUM = #{receiveNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_FINSH_TIME = #{sysFinshTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where EVA_CODE = #{evaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
